confirmByAdminText:
Hi {{name}},

A new user has requested access to Transition ({{host}}): {{usermail}}.

To confirm the user access, please click on the link below, or copy-paste the following URL {{userConfirmationUrl}}.

Thank you
confirmByUserText:
Hi {{name}},

You have requested access to Transition.

To confirm your access, please click on the link below, or copy-paste the following URL {{userConfirmationUrl}}.

Thank you
pendingConfirmByAdminText:
Hi {{name}},

your access request to Transition ({{host}}) will be reviewed by an administrator shortly.

Thank you
confirmedByAdminEmailText:
Hi {{name}},

your access request to Transition ({{host}}) has been confirmed. You can now use your account.
resetPasswordEmailText:
Hi {{name}},

You are receiving this because you have requested the reset of the password for your account.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process

{{resetPasswordUrl}}

If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

Thank you
magicLinkEmailText:
Welcome!

To connect to the application, click on the following link: {{magicLinkUrl}}.

Thank you

simulation.selectSimulation: Please select the simulation to run
simulation.willRunSimulationWithParams: Will run the simulation with the following parameters
simulation.TrRoutingStartingPort: Starting port used for trRouting calculations
